snippet: A man suspected of sending poison-laced letters to President Obama and two other officials was charged in a federal indictment made public Monday.
abstract: James E Dutschke, Mississippi man suspected of sending poison-laced letters to Pres Obama and two other officials, is charged in federal indictment.
lead_paragraph: A man suspected of sending poison-laced letters to President Obama and two other officials was charged in a federal indictment made public Monday.

headline.main: Mississippi: Indictment Unsealed in Ricin Case
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Indictment Unsealed In Ricin Case
